function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential exposure to uvgi if not properly installed or maintained.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation efficacy leading to high concentration of viral particles in the room space.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the value of the upper-room uv susceptibility constant for sars-cov-2","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of well-mixed room air may not reflect real-world conditions","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of the model used in assessing upper-room uvgi effectiveness","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on upper-room uvgi as the sole intervention for inhibiting covid-19 transmission in buildings.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of the anti-sars-cov-2 coatings","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown chemical groups to inactivate sars-cov-2","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to cuprous oxide as a pesticide and marine antifoulant","category":"Soil","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systemic toxicity associated with copper exposure","category":"Soil","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inactivation of sars-cov-2 using cu 2 o particles bound into a film","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to virus due to handling of materials","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection leading to virus survival on surfaces","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated equipment and tools as sources of transmission","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ethanol in the fabrication process","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to argon plasma during cleaning process","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing for sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to chemicals such as nitric acid and pure gopts","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination risk from unattached polymer chains during film fabrication","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to cu2o particles during film fabrication and testing","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of biological testing with sars-cov-2","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disinfection process and handling of sars-cov-2","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling of infectious materials","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Swift and dramatic inactivation of sars-cov-2 by the cu 2 o/pu coating, reducing the viral titer by 99.9% in 1 hour.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in sample preparation and testing leading to differences in the effectiveness of the coating.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to resolve the effects of the polyurethane-only coating, demonstrating the necessity of cu 2 o in the film.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for incomplete inactivation of the virus due to variability in wettability of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in reported biocidal mechanisms of cu 2 o compounds for viral inactivation","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain virucidal activity against specific viruses, such as sars-cov-2","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to sars-cov-2 virus during testing of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inactivation of sars-cov-2 virus on the coated surface","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Storage of coated samples under water for 13 days","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cu 2 o/pu film can be removed by heavy deliberate scratching","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cationic polymer coatings did not speed inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential release of sars-cov-2 virus from uncoated samples in the built environment","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential failure of other coating technologies amine and ammonium-based polymers to inactivate the virus","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of mechanical damage to the coating leading to loss of virus-inactivating properties","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Research involving viral titers may pose a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of the virus.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction leading to overcrowding and homelessness","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transiency and overcrowding facilitate covid-19 transmission","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evictions and housing displacement leading to increased crowding in residential environments","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor ventilation, pest infestations, and mold linked to respiratory conditions and poor health","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction and housing instability associated with comorbidities and mental health conditions","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Health risks associated with eviction","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inability to social distance in low-wage jobs and crowded living conditions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate housing design and planning contributing to poor living conditions and increased disease susceptibility.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"}]}
